living_situation: Lives in a suburban house with his wife and two adult children
family_summary: Andrés is married to Maria, and they have two children, Juan and Sofia, who are both in college.
communication_style: Prefers in-person consultations and values clear, direct communication with healthcare providers. Often brings a family member to appointments for support.
primary_motivation: To stay healthy and active for his family, especially to be a strong role model for his children.
barriers: Occasional language barriers and scheduling difficulties due to work commitments. Chronic pain sometimes limits his mobility.
support_system: His wife Maria is a strong support, along with his children who help with household tasks and accompany him to medical appointments when needed.
